# Lipiny, Gmina Warta

Lipiny  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Warta, within Sieradz County, Łódź Voivodeship, in central Poland. It lies approximately  east of Warta,  north of Sieradz, and  west of the regional capital Łódź.
